SENT.plain: Osteopetrosis is a collective term for a range of sclerosing bone diseases resulting from an absence or defective function of osteoclasts
The clinical expression is variable and includes skeletal, hematological and neurological manifestations
The common neurological manifestation includes cranial neuropathies involving optic, cochlear, facial and trigeminal nerves
Spastic quadriplegia occurring as a result of brain stem compression in osteopetrosis is uncommon
The association of Type 1 Arnold Chiari malformation with osteopetrosis resulting in brain stem compression syndrome is an extremely rare entity
